text: Neolitsea fischeri is a species of plant in the family Lauraceae. It is a small tree endemic to the Anaimalai and Palni Hills in southern India. The essential oils from the leaves, bark and fruits of Neolitsea fischeri have been characterized and shown to possess moderate to good activity against certain bacteria. ==References== fischeri Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Endemic flora of India (region) Category:Flora of Kerala Category:Flora of Tamil Nadu Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Neolitsea fischeri
